Auth-check.sublime-snippet.description: Determine if the current user is authenticated.

Auth-guest.sublime-snippet.description: Determine if the current user is a guest.

Auth-logout.sublime-snippet.description: Log the user out of the application.

Auth-guard.description: customize the "guard" that is used to authenticate and register users

Auth-attempt.description: Log by passing an array with key-value

Auth-login.description: Log an existing user instance into your application

Auth-loginUsingId.description: To log a user into the application by their ID

Auth-viaRemember.description: Determine if the user was authenticated using the "remember me" cookie.
